channel.title: Highscores Error Read Please
channel.description:
I am trying to add a highscores i have followed this guide http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/467584-pi-proper-highscores-system-web-server.html but when i logout of my character it displays this in the run.bat and does not upload and information to the database?
Rune Perfection ~ By Owner Sam ------------------------------------------------------------- Loaded clipmap in 30ms. [01/10/13 16:35]: Launching Rune Perfection...Please wait. [01/10/13 16:35]: Connected to MySQL Database! [01/10/13 16:35]: Loaded 1019 doors in 130ms. [01/10/13 16:35]: Loaded 273 Double doors in 19ms. [01/10/13 16:35]: Loaded clipmap in 47ms. [01/10/13 16:35]: Server listening on custom port:43595 [01/10/13 16:35]: java.lang.NullPointerException [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.Highscores.destroy(Highscores.ja va:54) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.Highscores.query(Highscores.java :44) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.Highscores.save(Highscores.java: 67) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.Client.logout(Client.java:1092) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processP acket(ClickingButtons.java:2658) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1916) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:138) [01/10/13 16:35]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:190)

item.title: Highscores Error Read Please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Coldmedicine:

I’m willing to pay to the one who has these files saved

Some of the files found in that tutorial were considered malicious…

Read full topic
